Yes, it is my partner, then sudden reflexes kicked in.

Grabbing anything he could find that could be used as a bandage, he   _   stopped the bleeding. After waiting for the gunfire to   _  . he picked his friend up off the ground and carried him off to   _  .
I ask you, "Who gives more when it comes to   _   our country?" The brave men and women who are willingly giving the final sacrifice . We   _   those who serve our country. We pray for their safety and well-being. We know with certainty, it is our freedoms they protect.
